titleStmt.title: The routing of the Lord Digby, and Sir Marmad. Langdale at Carlisle-Sands; by Sir John Brown. Certified by letters from Sir John Brown, to Generall Lesley, and other letters to the Scots commissioners. 100. slain upon the place. 200. horse taken. Digbyes quartermaster general. 3. collonels & lieut. collonels. 3. captaines. The Lord Digbyes standard. Sir Marm. Langdales standard. 3. cullers of horse. 1000. totally routed; and the Lord Digby and Sir Marmaduke Langdale, fled to the Isle of Man in a cock-boat. Commanded to be printed, and published according to order.

The routing of the Lord Digby, and Sir Marmad. Langdale at Carlisle-Sands; by Sir John Brown. Certified by letters from Sir John Brown, to Generall Lesley, and other letters to the Scots commissioners. 100. slain upon the place. 200. horse taken. Digbyes quartermaster general. 3. collonels & lieut. collonels. 3. captaines. The Lord Digbyes standard. Sir Marm. Langdales standard. 3. cullers of horse. 1000. totally routed; and the Lord Digby and Sir Marmaduke Langdale, fled to the Isle of Man in a cock-boat. Commanded to be printed, and published according to order.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
